definition[0]: someone who owns or controls something
example[1]: Season-ticket holders are furious at the rise in rail fares.
definition[1]: something that is used to hold an object
definition[2]: someone who possesses land, investments etc

definition[3]: the person who has a particular job
example[5]: The previous holder of the post resigned.
